titles.title: Pass Me Not, O Gentle Savior

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Pass me not, O gentle Savior, Hear my humble cry; While on others Thou art calling, Do not pass me by.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Savior, Savior, Hear my humble cry; While on others Thou are calling, Do not pass me by.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Let me at a throne of mercy Find a sweet relief; Kneeling there in deep contrition, Help my unbelief.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Trusting only in Thy merit, Would I seek Thy face; Heal my wounded, broken spirit, Save me by Thy grace.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thou the Spring of all my comfort, More than life to me, Whom have I on earth beside Thee? Whom in Heavâ€™n but Thee.
